description: Episode number 3 of Series "Teenagers' guide to the galaxy". Part of a series developed for young people aged 9-16 which deals with issues of communication skills, interpersonal skills, life skills and problem solving. "Reach for the stars" is all about your potential, your future and what you will be doing for the rest of your life. It discusses how you can help achieve that path to success or make your dreams come true and includes hints and worldly advice from teenagers and adults about decision-making; career choices; motivation; setting goals; initiative; self belief and potential. Features Colette Mann as Fay.
